Package au.edu.anu.twcore.ecosystem.runtime.space

Class FlatSurface

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.edu.anu.twcore.ecosystem.runtime.space.SpaceAdapter
      • au.edu.anu.twcore.ecosystem.runtime.space.FlatSurface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Container, DynamicContainer<SystemComponent>, DynamicSpace<SystemComponent>, ObserverDynamicSpace, Space<SystemComponent>, DynamicGraphObserver<SystemComponent,​SystemRelation>, SingleDataTrackerHolder<Metadata>, RngHolder, fr.cnrs.iees.identity.Identity, fr.cnrs.iees.rvgrid.observer.Observer, fr.ens.biologie.generic.Resettable
    public class FlatSurface
extends SpaceAdapter
    A spatial representation of a rectangular flat surface. Locations are known to a given precision that must be passed as an argument to the constructor. Internally, coordinates are stored as longs computed from real (double) coordinates truncated to precision.
    Author:
    Jacques Gignoux - 28 janv. 2020

      • relocate

        public void relocate​(SystemComponent item)
        Description copied from interface: DynamicSpace
